planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, faceup/facedown contact)
action: Buy a ship card. If unable buy a bounty card, even if at a navpoint
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a patrol within 3 spaces that has ship attack less or equal to this player's ship attack.
c. Encounter a bounty target within 3 spaces (character, crew, faceup contact)
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
